module SummitTeamBuilder
#===============================================================================
#  DO NOT EDIT THIS SECTION
#===============================================================================
	@team = [:PKMN1,:PKMN2,:PKMN3,:PKMN4,:PKMN5,:PKMN6]
	def self.team
		return @team
	end

#===============================================================================
# TEAM BUILDING STARTS BELOW
#===============================================================================
# Notes:
# - Team must have 6 PokÃ©mon.
# - Double check the TOURNEY MOVESET sheet on the Summit EX PokÃ©mon Changes
# spreadsheet to make sure all moves are legal.
# - All PokÃ©mon can legally have Tera Blast, even if not listed in the spreadsheet.
# - Please refrain from changing a PokÃ©mon's species or moveset using the
# in-game debug menu as this may make it invalid/illegal for online use.
# - Ability index starts at 0. This means that, in order to use Ability 1,
# you must set the ability_index to 0. To use Ability 2, set ability_index to 1.
# To use Ability 3 (Hidden Ability), set ability_index to 2.
# - Regional forms are allowed.
# - Make sure to maintain the proper formatting.
# Sample:
#	PKMN1 = {
#		:species => :SUNFLORA,
#		:tera_type => :DRAGON,
#		:moves => [:CUT,:FLASH,:SNORE,:PROTECT],
#		:form => 0,
#		:shiny => true,
#		:ability_index => 0,
#		:poke_ball => :MASTERBALL,
#		:item => :LEFTOVERS,
#		:nature => :TIMID,
#		:evs => [4,0,0,252,0,252]
#	}
#===============================================================================
# TEAM BUILDING STARTS BELOW
#===============================================================================
	PKMN1 = {
		:species => :SUNFLORA,
		:tera_type => :DRAGON,
		:moves => [:CUT,:FLASH,:SNORE,:PROTECT],
		:form => 0,
		:shiny => true,
		:ability_index => 0,
		:poke_ball => :MASTERBALL,
		:item => :LEFTOVERS,
		:nature => :TIMID,
		:evs => [4,0,0,252,0,252]
	}
end
